ResearchTabDef.label: BRF-Biotech of Flesh
ResearchTabDef.generalDescription: Unlock the technology of evil, which utilize flesh and blood and twisted things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Twisted Crucible
ResearchProjectDef.description: Some metal, some herbs, some of our flesh ...... plus some weird rituals and prayers ...... The elders told me it wasn't actually a thing human made. \n\n Some voice cried out an inaudible name in a sticky, fishy dream ....Yald... When we woke up such wisdom surfaced.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Shaping Twisted Meat
ResearchProjectDef.description: Breeding Twisted Meat with Reforged Meat and Bioferrite.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Primordial Flesh Cradle
ResearchProjectDef.description: Offer adequate Tributes to the cradle and summon forth primardial messengers of exquisite flesh.\n\n It was a miracle achieved by combining the remains of a human body that had been remodeled with the flesh of a monstrous being.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Summon Swarms
ResearchProjectDef.description: Those dark, twisted entities do not seem to be enemies of the Insect, and we do not know the reason why. But in that slimy, fishy dream, I seem to have learned that the swarm might be a resource for those things made by unnamable beings. \n\n Who knows if that's speculation or delusion?

ResearchProjectDef.label: Living Mechanism
ResearchProjectDef.description: Recasting the most primitive living machine from the leftover flesh of our Flesh beasts.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Base Flesh Shell
ResearchProjectDef.description: Using initially remodeled flesh and blood as a replacement for the native shell, it doesn't work any better, but we're well on our way to ascension.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Reconstructed Harbinger Flesh
ResearchProjectDef.description: Add that ghastly, twisted meat to the list of things to remodel. While the cost of making it safe for consumption and as a non-infectious state for deep contact with the unevolved human body is a bit more than it's worth, you believe it's for the sake of more in-depth research in the future rather than for immediate gain.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gorehulk Flesh Mass
ResearchProjectDef.description: By mimicking and using the remnants of Gorehulk, we get a whole new defense tech. An automated defense facility for living things that launches keratin spines at a target to do damage.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flesh Taint Spore
ResearchProjectDef.description: A great work that mimics fungi and zerg, laying down some sort of disgusting ground of flesh and blood in a manner similar to mycelial expansion.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Harbinger Planting
ResearchProjectDef.description: The harbinger tree was modified to create a specialized plant capable of spreading tentacle plants to grow and harvest reconstructed harbinger flesh.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Harbinger Seedling
ResearchProjectDef.description: Harbinger tree seeds are a rare trade item in rimworld, and it is difficult to find these seedlings to adapt to make our farms. We need to continue our research to find an easier way to manufacture ...... or a means to cultivate harbinger trees.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Bloody Agriculture
ResearchProjectDef.description: Growing and utilizing flesh plants. Those crops of Adytum Paradise were brought beyond the void by flesh entities with the power of transmutation, allowing us to put them to use.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Flesh Bio-Electricity
ResearchProjectDef.description: A technology that utilizes living organisms to produce and store electricity. It appears to be extraordinarily efficient after utilizing the remnants of anomalous entities.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Scarlet Forge
ResearchProjectDef.description: The new type of fleshbeast discovered from the giant pit is clearly an older and more distinctive being ... The tissues they leave behind reveal certain disturbing facts. This fleshbeast is more primitive while also differing in some ... technological lines from the entities we know ... Or perhaps today's fleshbeast was rewritten and modified by the influence of bioferrited ...\n\n Perhaps there is more to the unnameable presence in the void than just the one we are familiar with. Perhaps there was another hyperintelligent archotech mind active here long ago that no mortal can know. But that doesn't stop us from making poor imitations of archotech, such as fusing these tissue samples with bioferrited to create something newer and better ...

ResearchProjectDef.label: Pulse of Flesh Shell
ResearchProjectDef.description: Through my research into flesh heart, the root of all evils in the attacks of the modern flesh beast, I am convinced that those disturbingly more primitive flesh and blood are valid. By mixing those tissue's with flesh heart's neural lump, we can obtain a biological artillery shell capable of releasing a biological pulse that cauterises the target. \n\n This pulse could achieve the same effect as a current of that frequency obtained after analysing all the neural lump, allowing us to destroy the flesh heart faster.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Invisible Watcher
ResearchProjectDef.description: By studying revenant, we have learned how to modify a revenant spine to allow us to briefly borrow its cloaking abilities. Now perhaps we should try to reverse the research as well: \n\n The only thing that can target the hyperintelligent archotech mind is themself, but it shouldn't be too hard to use what's left of them to devise a device to target the cloaking ability.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Base Wetware Server
ResearchProjectDef.description: Freshly removed brains are processed and strung into some sort of wetware servo, which is linked near the research facility to aid in scientific research.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Limb Guard
ResearchProjectDef.description: Like Clump, maybe we could make some of these limb-based entities ... but the friendly kind. With the analysis of those more ancient but more advanced organisations, it may no longer be delusional to have entities working and guarding for us.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Living Flesh Shell
ResearchProjectDef.description: Is the unknown energy that creates the nightmarishly terrifying aberrant creatures in Twisted Obelisk more ... ancient than thought? Or primitive? \n\n There's something in the body of Clump or some other even more ancient and advanced freshbeast with similar properties ... Sorry, I can't describe it, but if harnessed, we might be able to create the kind of limbs that go through the aberration in a more stable way.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Lower Neural Symbiosis
ResearchProjectDef.description:
As creepy as the Scarlet Cerebral Jellyfish's violation of its victims' brains may be, new research suggests that the Scarlet Cerebral Jellyfish is able to affect its victims' minds for more than just the bizarre chemicals that the wriggling tentacles inject into the brain.The tentacles of that blasphemous creature in fact have some neural structures that defy the laws of nature ...... They are able to take over some of the functions of the brain ...... 

 If we are determined to mimic them ...... a limited replica of this neural structure to a Neural Symbiosis in the form of a mollusk that can connect to our spine and brainstem ...... a whole new symbiosis shaped by us I call it “Brain Slug”. 

 Although they are still young and immature, I believe that the technology of remodeling flesh will bring them to perfection along with us.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Summon Clumps
ResearchProjectDef.description:
That primitive, ancient and efficient organization proved to be highly valuable material for the development of biotechnology. The kind of Clump that seems to be used as a combat unit seems to be more attracted to psychic pulse than the Primordial Fleshbeast, the rare prototype in PitGate. 

 Though The Guards beyond the Garden of Paradise, The Ones with Eternal Limbs, and other murmuring voices ... are confusing and frightening ... 

 "We are livestock selecting ourselves for harvest. We bite and claw and thrash to survive. We eat each other lest we be eaten ourselves only to die anyway. We breed so that our children may one day be consumed just as we will."

ResearchProjectDef.label: Scarlet Transformation Technique
ResearchProjectDef.description: We speculate that the monster resembling a type of fleshy fungus was born to transform the environment into the form expected by its creator. But obviously, this transformation is not so beneficial to us who have not yet ascended. So using another way to harness this power is a more reasonable choice. For example, using their remains and our flesh and blood to create an altar for transformation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Crimson Furniture
ResearchProjectDef.description: [Sorry, but this part of the development has been put on hold due to lack of art resources and capabilities.]

ResearchProjectDef.label: Spitter Fleshworm
ResearchProjectDef.description: Further research on fleshheart has yielded the technology to create spitter organs that belong to us. We've freed ourselves from the reliance on destructive analysis of those neural tissues. Using the coding in those tissues, we were able to construct a more worm-like organ of flesh and blood for our defence.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Tier 3
ResearchProjectDef.description: --WIP--
